alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 05 at 1:43PM MDT until November 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Backcountry travel will be very difficult. Damaging winds could blow down trees. Heavy snow and blowing snow will drift over remote trails and backcountry roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County
